PATV14.title: Up Above the World So High
PATV14.path: ../Planet Of The Apes (Television)/Planet Of The Apes TV 14.mp4
PATV14.description: Unaware that a chimpanzee scientist plans to use a human prisoner's flying machine for her own deadly purpose, Virdon, Burke and Galen help the man, Leuric, to build a hang glider.

DRHI15.title: Hawaii
DRHI15.description: ames Cook "discovers" Hawaii and parties with the natives, Japanese-American Daniel Inouye fights heroically in World War II, and Eddie Aikau becomes one of the world's greatest big wave surfers.

SPRA29.title: The Race Against Time (part 2)
SPRA29.path: ../Speed Racer/Speed Racer - 29 The Race Against Time (part 2, SD).m4v
SPRA29.description: Speed and Trixie are made slaves and ordered to dig up treasure. But Speed has an escape and rescue plan in mind.

POIR03.title: The Adventure of Johnnie Waverly
POIR03.description: Poirot tries to prevent the kidnapping of a country squire's son. While his plan fails, all is not what it seems.

LITB071.title: Friendship
LITB071.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 071 Friendship.mp4
LITB071.description: Drawing from a classic story of true friendship, Ward helps Beaver make up with his pal Larry after the two boys have a big fight.

CSMS05.title: Blues for a Red Planet
CSMS05.description: Carl Sagan looks at the search for life on Mars from the speculations of Percival Lowell and H.G. Wells to the arrival of the Viking probes.

RT66029.title: Welcome to Amity
RT66029.description: Tod and Buz, working as laborers in a factory in Amity, Ohio, meet a strange young woman at their boarding house. She is towing a headstone on a trailer behind her car-with the person's date of death from 10 years before. Finding she is a pariah in Amity, Tod and Buz offer help in carrying out her unusual mission.

LITB072.title: Dance Contest
LITB072.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 072 Dance Contest.mp4
LITB072.description: Wally is the envy of his friends when pretty Mary Ellen Rogers invites him to her school cotillion. But they don't know what Wally soon finds out...Mary Ellen has entered them in a "cha-cha" contest and Wally doesn't know the steps.

SPRA30.title: The Snake Track
SPRA30.description: Speed learns to master the Snake Track, a course with strategically placed curves, with the help of Rock Force, a one-armed driver.

STAN15.title: The Eye of the Beholder
STAN15.path: ../Star Trek Animated Series/Star Trek Animated Series - 15 The Eye of the Beholder.m4v
STAN15.description: While investigating the disappearance of Federation members, Kirk and his landing party find themselves placed in an alien zoo.

RT66030.title: Incident on a Bridge
RT66030.description: Tod and Buz, in Cleveland, Ohio working as laborers on a "three week job at a gravel yard", stay at their Russian supervisor's home. He has a mute daughter who has a miserable life. When a fellow Russian, whom the community has ostracized, shows his love for her tragedy follows. The two ill-fated people meet an uncertain end.

LITB073.title: Wally's Haircomb
LITB073.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 073 Wally's Haircomb.mp4
LITB073.description: Ward and June find it hard to convince Wally that his new "fad" hairstyle makes him look ridiculous, especially when all his friends are combing their hair the same way.

LITB074.title: The Cookie Fund
LITB074.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 074 The Cookie Fund.mp4
LITB074.description: Cookie chairmen Beaver and Larry find themselves in a bind when they loan three dollars out of the school cookie fund to an older boy with a hard luck story and he refuses to pay them back.

ULTR29.title: Challenge to the Underground
ULTR29.description: After all of the gold in a mountain has disappeared it is revealed that a monster has been eating the precious metal.

LITB075.title: Forgotten Party
LITB075.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 075 Forgotten Party.mp4
LITB075.description: Beaver forgets he's been invited to old friend David Manning's birthday party, is embarrassed to give David what he considers to be a "baby" toy that June bought for him at the last minute, and must think fast to come up with a more appropriate gift.

SOKO15.title: Igganog: The Ice-Berg Monster
SOKO15.description: Daisaku and Minami suspect that a strange villa standing in the heart of the Japanese Alps is a secret base of BF Syndicate. They approach the house to get some proof, when men in the house notice them and look for them.

ULTR30.title: Phantom of the Snow Mountains
ULTR30.description: After a ski resort experiences some trouble, the Science Patrol investigates a mysterious girl and her rumored guardian monster.

ULTR14J.path: ../Ultraman (Japanese, Engligh Subtitled)/Ultraman - 14 The Pearl Defense Directive.mp4
ULTR14J.title: The Pearl Defense Directive
